title: [BUG] Lunar Revel Shop changing skins on sale upon refresh
body: Anyone else having this problem? I had Pool Party Lee Sin on sale this morning, played a game, and now it has Dragonfist Lee Sin on sale. My friend also had his Arclight Vel'koz changed to Battlecast. Is there anyway to reverse this?

replies.body: As I understand, they replaced any skins that are going to be on sale either this month or next month.

Yep 1/29/2016
I had Pool party Leona
Now I have the crappy Valkyrie skin on sale .
Looks like I'm just going to have to wait for project to go on sale but even than, that's not enough to compensate for the gains I would have had with the lunar reveal shop.
Petty I say.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
So how did it happen? I wouldn't mind getting a refresh.

I went into game after checking my Revel shop, came back to it and in place of the Pool Party Lee was an unopened vault. Thinking it was a visual bug, I opened it but it turned out to be Dragonfist Lee instead :/
Couldn't get it to happen playing aram. Maybe it's too short heh
my dragon blade riven changed into a battle bunny and my mafia jinx turned into a fire cracker jinx, and i was gonna buy dragonblade :(
I thought I was the only with this bug. Mine changed from High Noon Yasuo to Blood Moon Thresh.
I HAD FUCKING THE LUNAR REVEL RIVEN SKIN and i was like, oh ill wait till morning, wake up oh wtf, its back to unchecked, roll it and get 20% off a FUCKING SKARNER SKIN
